abstract: The co-chairman of Vivid Video, the pornography film studio, plans on Saturday to take Google and Yahoo to task for being purveyors of smut to minors. But it isn’t because he finds free pornography to be a competitive threat, is it?
snippet: The co-chairman of Vivid Video, the pornography film studio, plans on Saturday to take Google and Yahoo to task for being purveyors of smut to minors. But it isn’t because he finds free pornography to be a competitive threat, is it?
lead_paragraph: Steven Hirsch, the co-chairman of Vivid Video, the pornography film studio, plans on Saturday to take Google and Yahoo to task for being purveyors of smut to minors.

headline.main: The Birds, the Bees and Hardcore Business
